cta.likecoin-button: Click the LikeCoin button in any articles, distribute Creators Fund to reward the creators.
cta.sponsor-link.banner.alt: Copy and share your sponsor link
cta.sponsor-link.hint: Build your fans group by this link. Learn more
cta.writing-nft.title: Collect to support now
nft_notification_purchase_multiple_conte: Congratulation! <buyer>BUYER</buyer> has collected your following works for <price>LIKE</price>:
nft_notification_purchase_multiple_subje: You have sold {count} items for {price} LIKE
nft_notification_purchase_multiple_title: You have sold {count} items for {price} LIKE
nft_notification_transfer_content: <sender>SENDER</sender> has sent you a piece of creative work <nft>NFT_TITLE</nft>.
referral-tx.check-wallet: The rewards had been transferred to your wallet, you may open the Liker Land app and check.
referral-tx.description.referee:
You have installed Liker Land app with user's referral code.

You both received {amount} LikeCoin as rewards.
referral-tx.description.referrer:
user has installed Liker Land app because of you.

You both received {amount} LikeCoin as rewards.
referral-tx.title: Congratulation, you received referral rewards
Click LikeCoin button to support creators you love
The Creators Fund aims to reward good content, and is distributed by Civic Likers' like action. {count} creators were benefited by your Likes this month!
The Creators Fund aims to reward good content, and is distributed by Civic Likers' like action. Give your Likes, be part of it.
report.monthly.civic-liker.subject: Civic Liker Report ({date})
report.monthly.civic-liker.subscribers.d: You are supporting the follow creators by monthly subscription. Your billing date is {day} of each month. Click here to manage your subscription
report.monthly.civic-liker.supported.con: The creators have got extra bonus from the Creators Fund by your likes. You can check the details in Liker Land app.
report.monthly.civic-liker.title: Civic Liker Report
report.monthly.civic-liker.v3.creator: {count, plural, one {Creator} other {Creators}}
report.monthly.civic-liker.v3.creators-f: Bonus sponsored by LikeCoin community, distributed by Likers.
report.monthly.civic-liker.v3.delegation: New budget for reward this month
report.monthly.civic-liker.v3.disclaimer: LIKE/USD price is calculated when sending this email
report.monthly.creator.subject: Monthly LikeCoin Reward Summary ({date})
report.monthly.creator.title: Monthly LikeCoin Reward Summary
reset-password.content:
Hi {name},



We got a request to reset your Liker Land password.
reset-password.subject: Reset Liker Land Password
reset-password.subtitle: Reset Liker Land Password
reset-password.text:
Didn't make such request?

Simply ignore this email and no changes were made to your account yet.

Please contact us if you need further support.
transaction.content:

You have received {amount} LikeCoin from {fromUser}.

Check the transaction details:
